ascend_skill.desc:
Increase Tempest Riko's max SP to 200, and increase her SP Recovery by 60%. When using a skill to restore her own SP, the amount recovered is affected by SP Recovery.
When using Blossoming Season, spend all SP, and activate different effects based on the amount of SP spent.
ascend_skill.name: Fragrant Gale

ascend_skill.desc:
The condition to activate the Falling Petals effect from Storm of Petals changes from Wind damage to any attribute damage. Also, increase the target's critical damage taken by 30%.
Arrival of Spring increases Sweeper allies' Attack by 25% more.
ascend_skill.name: Colors of Dawn

ascend_skill.desc:
Increase Tempest Riko's max SP by 50 (also increase the maximum effect of Blossoming Season). Also, after activating Blossoming Season, immediately recover 50 SP.
Enhance the effect of the Talent Vernal Splendor: Double the critical damage increase after gaining 5/10 Blossom stacks.
ascend_skill.name: East Wind

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Arrival of Spring and Blossoming Season by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Swaying Boughs

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: The buff effect now applies to all allies besides Tempest Riko. Increase the main target's critical damage by 12% more, and restore 32 SP to all allies besides Tempest Riko.
ascend_skill.name: Sea Breeze

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Storm of Petals and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Rage of Spring

ascend_skill.desc:
Blossoming Season now affects all allies besides Tempest Riko. When the main target uses a skill, immediately activate Storm of Petals 1 time on the target foe. This effect can only be activated 1 time for each use of Blossoming Season. Also, extend the duration of Falling Petals from Storm of Petals by 1 turn.
While Riko is on the field, when any ally deals damage, for every 1% of their critical rate that exceeds 100%, increase the critical damage of that damage by 2%.
ascend_skill.name: Full Blossom

highlight_skill.desc:
Increase 1 other ally's Attack (for every 1% of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100%, increase Attack by 2.5, up to 388.0%/418.0%/418.0%/448.0% of critical multiplier) and increase critical damage by 24.4%/26.9%/25.9%/28.4% for 2 turns.
Also, restore 20 SP to all allies besides Tempest Riko.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 183.0%/201.8%/194.2%/213.0% of Attack, and inflict Windswept and Falling Petals for 2 turns.
Falling Petals: When taking Wind damage, increase Attack for that damage. The increase is equal to 18.3% of the portion of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100% (up to 388.0%/418.0%/418.0%/448.0% of critical multiplier).
Also, restore Tempest Riko's SP by 16.
normal_skill.name: Storm of Petals

normal_skill.desc:
Increase party's Attack for 2 turns. The increase is equal to 12.8% of the portion of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100% (up to 388.0%/418.0%/418.0%/448.0% of critical multiplier). Also, restore party's SP by 4.
For one time only while this effect is active, when an ally deals damage with a skill, Resonance, or Highlight, restore Tempest Riko's SP by 12.
normal_skill.name: Arrival of Spring

normal_skill.desc:
Spend all SP, and increase 1 other ally's critical rate by 16.0%/17.0%/17.0%/18.0% for 2 turns. Also, apply the following effects based on the amount of SP spent. For every 2 SP spent, increase the effect by 1%.
50 SP or higher: For every 1% of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100%, increase Attack by 2.4.
100 SP or higher: Increase critical damage by 12% of the portion of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100%.
150 SP or higher: Increase critical damage more by 6% of the portion of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100%.
These effects count up to 388.0%/418.0%/418.0%/448.0% of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier.
normal_skill.name: Blossoming Season

passive_skill.desc:
After using Blossoming Season, grant Unravel to the target for 2 turns.
Unravel: Each time skill damage is dealt, gain 1 Blossom stack.
Blossom: Increase Attack by 30 for 3 turns. Stacks up to 10 times. After gaining 5 Blossom stacks, increase Attack more by 8.0% of the portion of Tempest Riko's critical multiplier that exceeds 100%, and increase critical damage by 5.0% of the portion of her critical multiplier that exceeds 100%. After gaining 10 Blossom stacks, critical damage is increased more. This increase is equal to 5.0% of the portion of her critical multiplier that exceeds 100%.
passive_skill.name: Vernal Splendor

passive_skill.desc: During battle, increase critical damage and HP based on Tempest Riko's SP Recovery. At a maximum of 450.0% SP Recovery, increase critical damage by 84.0%, and HP by 1800.0.
passive_skill.name: Sun-kissed Blooms
